unnormalised: State budgets, like Maharashtra's annual fiscal plan, are crucial. Understanding allocations, say, for education in Kerala after Onam, is vital. Rs. 5000 Cr earmarked for rural roads (5000 km) affects accessibility. Deficits need scrutiny. Check Comptroller and Auditor General (CAG) reports. Public awareness ensures better governance, like demand for biryani affects prices.
